mapper.insert: insert into task (tsk_id, tsk_name, tsk_leader_id, tsk_type, tsk_time, tsk_creation, tsk_createdby, tsk_lastupdated, tsk_lastupdatedby, tsk_isdel) values (#{tsk_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsk_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsk_leader_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsk_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsk_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsk_creation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tsk_createdby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsk_lastupdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tsk_lastupdatedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsk_isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update task set tsk_name = #{tsk_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsk_leader_id = #{tsk_leader_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tsk_type = #{tsk_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tsk_time = #{tsk_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsk_creation = #{tsk_creation,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsk_createdby = #{tsk_createdby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tsk_lastupdated = #{tsk_lastupdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsk_lastupdatedby = #{tsk_lastupdatedby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tsk_isdel = #{tsk_isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tsk_id = #{tsk_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tsk_id, tsk_name, tsk_leader_id, tsk_type, tsk_time, tsk_creation, tsk_createdby, tsk_lastupdated, tsk_lastupdatedby, tsk_isdel from task where tsk_id = #{tsk_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select tsk_id, tsk_name, tsk_leader_id, tsk_type, tsk_time, tsk_creation, tsk_createdby, tsk_lastupdated, tsk_lastupdatedby, tsk_isdel from task
